name: BumpinBook
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bumpin book
des:
Get an inside look at BUMPIN': THE MODERN GUIDE TO PREGNANCY by Leslie Schrock!
Wherever you are in the parenting journey, from before conception to your child's first months post-birth, this book is your ultimate, thoroughly modern guide to navigating health, preparations, important decisions, relationships, going back to work, and more.
Linda Avey, co-founder of 23andMe, calls BUMPIN' "a smart, approachable guide packed with practical advice for parents who want a science-backed, individualized approach to pregnancy."
With this Skill, you can access exclusive previews of the book, take the Modern Pregnancy 101 Quiz, and learn more about the author! If you’d like to receive even more information about this book via text, just say your phone number aloud when prompted by the Skill.
Important Notes:
- The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
- User can select to hear a book preview (about 1-3 topics they select from), take an interactive mini-quiz (about trivia on the topic), or hear/learn more about the author.
- User has option to provide phone number (say digits aloud) in order to receive text with web link to more details about book.
- The SMS is sent from a variable short code (no specific set phone number).
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
